positionalArguments.name: <sequences>
positionalArguments.description:
input file in FASTA/FASTQ format (can be compressed with gzip)
containing sequences used for correction

positionalArguments.name: <overlaps>
positionalArguments.description:
input file in MHAP/PAF/SAM format (can be compressed with gzip)
containing overlaps between sequences and target sequences

positionalArguments.name: <target sequences>
positionalArguments.description:
input file in FASTA/FASTQ format (can be compressed with gzip)
containing sequences which will be corrected

options.description: perform fragment correction instead of contig polishing (overlaps file should contain dual/self overlaps!)
default: 500 size of window on which POA is performed
default: 10.0 threshold for average base quality of windows used in POA
default: 0.3 maximum allowed error rate used for filtering overlaps
disables consensus trimming at window ends
